english: They had no other choice but to surrender .
chinese: 他们别无选择，只能投降。

english: Forcing them to surrender would be impossible .
chinese: 要他们投降是不可能的。

english: They had no other choice but surrender .
chinese: 他们别无选择，只能投降。

english: They will not surrender to a dinghy .
chinese: 他们决不会向一只小艇投降。

english: Shit, mate, you're lowering the flag .

chinese: 投降造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: I had better resign myself to destiny .
chinese: 我最好还是向命运投降。

english: Bloggs were at last forced to give in .
chinese: 布罗格斯终于被迫投降。

english: The white flag is a token of surrender .

chinese: 部队人困马乏结果投降了。

english: He was wounded and had to yield himself prisoner .
chinese: 他受伤后不得不投降做俘虏。

english: They surrendered without putting up much of a fight .
chinese: 他们没怎么抵抗就投降了。

english: Their leader had no alternative but to submit .
chinese: 他们的领导人除投降外，别无它法。

english: The men in the fort capitulated .
I would rather die than surrender .
